TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AggregationRangeVariableSyntax extends Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.VisualBasicSyntaxNode
Public NotInheritable Class AggregationRangeVariableSyntax Inherits VisualBasicSyntaxNode

Docs.summary: Describes a single variable of the form "[x [As Type] =] aggregation-function" for use in the Into clause of Aggregate or Group By or Group Join query operators.

public Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.AggregationSyntax Aggregation { get; }

Public ReadOnly Property Aggregation As AggregationSyntax

Docs.summary: The name of the aggregation function. The "Group" aggregation function is represented by the identifier "Group".

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.VariableNameEqualsSyntax NameEquals { get; }
.property instance class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Syntax.VariableNameEqualsSyntax NameEquals
Public ReadOnly Property NameEquals As VariableNameEqualsSyntax

Docs.summary: The optional name and type of the expression range variable. If omitted, the name of the expression range variable is inferred from the aggregation expression.
Docs.remarks: This child is optional. If it is not present, then Nothing is returned.
